abstract: After a weeklong vote, Facebook members voted in approval of the company’s new privacy policy and terms of service.
snippet: After a weeklong vote, Facebook members voted in approval of the company’s new privacy policy and terms of service.
lead_paragraph: After a weeklong public vote, Facebook members approved the company’s proposed changes to its terms of service.

headline.main: Facebookers Approve New Policy, but Still Hate Redesign
